name: Neon Swipe Saber - Rhythm Game
description:
An all new EDM experience with saber blocks coming towards you and coming in rhythm is all that matters.

You get to choose from so many great music tracks that will keep you at the edge of your seat. Plus a dancing uncle that can spur you on to complete the whole track while your at it. Swipe in the right directions to get rid of the blocks.

TWO BLOCKS

You will face two blocks simultaneously coming towards you with different arrows on them. You have to choose the right direction so cut them and score a point.


MUSIC TRACKS

Select from different music tracks, plus unlock the locked ones by progressing through the game


MUSICAL UNCLE

one of the main features is your cheerleader uncle who you can call upon your combos and critical hits. He will show you different moves every time he comes on to dance
